1: Make a joyful noise unto Jehovah, [b]all ye lands.
2: Serve Jehovah with gladness: Come before his presence with singing.
3: Know ye that Jehovah, he is God: It is he that hath made us, [c]and we are his; We are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
4: Enter into his gates with [d]thanksgiving, And into his courts with praise: Give thanks unto him, and bless his name.
5: For Jehovah is good; his lovingkindness endureth for ever, And his faithfulness unto all generations.
